scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:unit" "cd client && npm run test:unit"
scripts.test:integration: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:integration" "cd client && npm run test:integration"
